text: Fernando Lima Bello (27 November 1931 â€“ 3 June 2021) was a Portuguese sailor. He was the country's only member of the International Olympic Committee, which he was elected to in 1989. He was Portuguese national champion in Star, Dragon and Sharpie 12 m2. Lima Bello was born in Lisbon. He took part of the 1968 and 1972 Summer Olympics. Lima Bello died on 3 June 2021 in Lisbon, aged 89. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Portugal Category:Sportspeople from Lisbon Category:Portuguese sailors Category:International Olympic Committee
title: Fernando Lima Bello
